title: No Missions
body: Ever since the VS. Missions ended i've gotten no more missions  and i've played every day since, is this normal? Are there no  more missions, I was going to post this in bug reports but apparently i'm not level 6??? I'm pretty sure i'm level 30.

replies.body:
About that board's level first, sometimes it just needs a little push to get updated correctly. Posting here pushed that update through it looks like!

About those missions, the Missions were at first only centered around the Versus Event. Since ending, it's normal to not have seen any missions at all. We're still bringing them back, VS was sort of a testing ground for us. We currently have 2 missions going on for Kayn, but you *do* need to own him first. However, when he goes free to play you'll have the missions as well!
